meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Terry Sheldon Mary Haney Steven Popper Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #832.

td.p: Terry Sheldon, an entrepreneur from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Mary Haney, an assistant director for an alumni association from Brooklyn, New York
Steven Popper, an economist originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,200)

tr.td: SCIENCE
WOMEN IN HISTORY
COUNTRY CROONERS
WEDDINGS
LEATHER
"BROAD" MINDED

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Terry: What is gold?)

silver

StevenTerry
')

tr.td: Steven
Mary

(lock game)

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
MaryWho is Lincoln?
$500
TerryWho was F.D.R.?
$4,500
StevenWho was F.D. Roosevelt?
$2,100
Franklin Delano Roosevelt')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'He was the last U.S. president to take the oath of office on March 4th')

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL INAUGURATIONS
He was the last U.S. president to take the oath of office on March 4th
Steven
Mary
Terry
2-day champion: $25,700
3rd place: a side-by-side refrigerator/freezer + Jeopardy! box game
2nd place: a trip for 2 to Tampa, Florida + Jeopardy! box game
Steven
Mary
Terry

28 R
(including 2 DDs),
1 W

6 R,
6 W

18 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W
